title: Ticket #7153: Remove most of the old doc directory
description: Now that we have movde to read the docs, we need to get rid of the doc/ directory with all the LaTeX documentation. Since, we still make man pages on the old systems (such as RHEL6), we will retain the man pages in LaTeX on the stable branch.
